params.about_me: Hello everyone my name is Avinay Mehta and this is my first website which I have created to introduce myself. This website is purely made by using the HTML and CSS languages. As this is my first website so I tried to keep it simple and just shown little bit of my skills which I have learned. As I want to become the professional web developer so this is my small step to start my journey to become one. Currently I am presuing my master's degree in Computer Applications in Vellore Institute of Technology in India and I am looking forward to create better and bigger websites
